verses.text: \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w summons|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H8121"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w sunrise|strong="H4217"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w sunset|strong="H8121"\w*.

\w From|strong="H3313"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w perfection|strong="H4359"\w* \w of|strong="H4359"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, God’s glory \w shines|strong="H3313"\w* \w forth|strong="H3313"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H6440"\w* God \w comes|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* cannot \w keep|strong="H2790"\w* \w silence|strong="H2790"\w*, devouring fire \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* furious tempest \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w He|strong="H7121"\w* \w summons|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H5920"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Gather \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* covenant-sacrifice bound \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*;

\w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w may|strong="H1931"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H5046"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w*. \qs \+w Selah|strong="H5542"\+w*\qs*

“\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w protest|strong="H5749"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w I|strong="H8085"\w* am \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w your|strong="H8085"\w* God.

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* burnt-offerings \w are|strong="H5930"\w* \w ever|strong="H8548"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*

\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w male|strong="H6260"\w* \w goats|strong="H6260"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w folds|strong="H4356"\w*;

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w are|strong="H3293"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kine \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w hills|strong="H2042"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* air, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w moves|strong="H2123"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w mine|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w Were|strong="H8398"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7456"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* would \w not|strong="H3808"\w* tell \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w* \w and|strong="H8398"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* \w fulness|strong="H4393"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* mine.

Am \w I|strong="H1320"\w* such as \w to|strong="H1320"\w* eat bulls’ \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w or|strong="H1320"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*?

\w Offer|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H2076"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thank-offering, \w pay|strong="H7999"\w* \w the|strong="H2076"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w* \w your|strong="H7999"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w Summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w rescue|strong="H2502"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w so|strong="H7121"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* God \w says|strong="H6310"\w*: “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* right \w have|strong="H7563"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w talk|strong="H5608"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, \w or|strong="H6310"\w* \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*

while \w you|strong="H8130"\w* yourself \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w correction|strong="H4148"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w my|strong="H7993"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* behind \w you|strong="H8130"\w*?

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w*, \w you|strong="H5973"\w* run \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*; \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w adulterers|strong="H5003"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w keep|strong="H7200"\w* company.

\w You|strong="H7971"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w loose|strong="H7971"\w* \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w your|strong="H7971"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* contrives \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* shamefully \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* kin, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w slander|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* own mother’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* because \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w silence|strong="H2790"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w*, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w take|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w yourself|strong="H6213"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3644"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* convict \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* plainly.

“\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w* \w who|strong="H7911"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* God, mark \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* I rend \w you|strong="H6435"\w*, past hope of \w deliverance|strong="H5337"\w*.

Those who \w bring|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thank-offering \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*; \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* those: who follows \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1870"\w* \w show|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* God.”
